fields.name: CodeConfiguration
fields.description: Code configuration for the endpoint deployment.

fields.name: Compute
fields.description: Compute target for batch inference operation.

fields.name: DeploymentConfiguration
fields.description: Properties relevant to different deployment types.

fields.name: EnvironmentId
fields.description: ARM resource ID of the environment specification for the endpoint deployment.

fields.name: EnvironmentVariables
fields.description: Environment variables configuration for the deployment.

fields.name: ErrorThreshold
fields.description:
Error threshold, if the error count for the entire input goes above this value,
the batch inference will be aborted. Range is [-1, int.MaxValue].
For FileDataset, this value is the count of file failures.
For TabularDataset, this value is the count of record failures.
If set to -1 (the lower bound), all failures during batch inference will be ignored.

fields.name: LoggingLevel
fields.description: Logging level for batch inference operation.

fields.name: MaxConcurrencyPerInstance
fields.description: Indicates maximum number of parallelism per instance.

fields.name: MiniBatchSize
fields.description:
Size of the mini-batch passed to each batch invocation.
For FileDataset, this is the number of files per mini-batch.
For TabularDataset, this is the size of the records in bytes, per mini-batch.

fields.name: Model
fields.description: Reference to the model asset for the endpoint deployment.

fields.name: OutputAction
fields.description: Indicates how the output will be organized.

fields.name: OutputFileName
fields.description: Customized output file name for append_row output action.

fields.name: Properties
fields.description: Property dictionary. Properties can be added, but not removed or altered.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Provisioning state for the endpoint deployment.

fields.name: Resources
fields.description:
Indicates compute configuration for the job.
If not provided, will default to the defaults defined in ResourceConfiguration.

fields.name: RetrySettings
fields.description:
Retry Settings for the batch inference operation.
If not provided, will default to the defaults defined in BatchRetrySettings.
